name: The Wall (itch) (nickoctopus)
description:
A short Cold War thriller about a spy trying to escape East Berlin, written in three days for Inkjam 2021.

It's replayable with twelve different endings available dependent on what items you find.   

The formatting probably works slightly better fullscreen, since a couple of the sections are a bit wordy, but it was my first time using Ink so things were rushed to meet the submission deadline!
